text: Prince Félix of Bourbon-ParmaArrêté grand-ducal du 17 juillet 1945 – "Legilux" Legal information website of the Luxembourg government (Félix Marie Vincent; 28 September 1893 - 8 April 1970), later Prince Félix of Luxembourg, was the husband of Charlotte, Grand Duchess of Luxembourg and the father of her six children, including her replacement: Grand Duke Jean. He was the longest serving consort of Luxembourg. ==References== Category:1893 births Category:1970 deaths Category:Luxembourgian princes and princesses
title: Prince Felix of Bourbon-Parma
